content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_block
inventory=[{"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 36, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 61, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 29, "index": 22}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to craft a lapis block, which requires 9 lapis lazuli in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving the first lapis lazuli from slot 33 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
